content.title: The Meeting House Locations
content.description: Our hope is to create spaces for spiritual seekers to come and ask questions, develop authentic relationships, and meaningfully engage the teachings of Jesus.

content.text1: Our hope is to create spaces for spiritual seekers to come and ask questions, develop authentic relationships, and meaningfully engage the life and teachings of Jesus.

image1.alt: A map of meeting house churches.

content.text1: It's pretty simple: choose a city, connect with the local Meeting House community, discover how you can participate online or in person.

content.text1: During the week we meet to study and apply Sunday's teaching, build relationships in smaller groups, and care for our local neighbourhoods. We call this Home Churchâ€”and it's kind of the best thing we've got going.

content.text1: We believe a more connected, relational network of churches and leaders could give greater unity, voice, and visibility to this Jesus-centred, third-way movement. Want to learn more?

content.text2: Not ready to connect with one of our locations but still interested in exploring the teachings of Jesus? Drop your email below and we'll send you some of our favourite content and help you navigate your next step.
